SETTINGS.DaggerheartMacroShorthandL: Enable a shortened macro syntax which allows referencing attributes directly, for example @str instead of @attributes.str.value. Disable this setting if you need the ability to reference the full attribute model, for example @attributes.str.label.
SETTINGS.DaggerheartInitFormulaL: Enter an initiative formula, such as d20+@dex
DAGGERHEART.NotifyGroupAttrDuplicate: Attribute group already exists as an attribute.
DAGGERHEART.NotifyGroupAlphanumeric: Attribute group names may not contain spaces or periods.
DAGGERHEART.NotifyGroupReserved: Attribute group "{key}" is reserved and cannot be used.
DAGGERHEART.NotifyAttrDuplicate: Attribute key already exists as a group.
